TopicTitle: HELP! I need to establish base behind the mountains near KSC

Articles.Content:
1 I need a runway for all this...

so to get it there, I need to get hyperedit... Where do I get it?

2 After that, I need to make it cool and get life support mods and stuff...

3 I need to re learn how to make cars and rovers because my old ones no longer work in the new release...

4 I need to get A way to make enough power to light up 500 illuminator Mk2s.

And To top it all, a way to build this all in one peice...
Not sure what you mean by needing a runway, but for the base you could brute toss it with 3.75m rockets in parachute it in.

1. Could you explain exactly why you need a runway behind the mountains? What purpose does it serve? Why can't you just use the existing runway?

4. 500 lights? That's a bit over kill. For starters KSP will only display like...8 pixel lights at a time at max settings? For two, 500 of anything is going to kill your frame rate all on it's own.

As far as HyperEdit goes, you get it here:

Sometimes your soul tells you to build a base behind some mountains.   That's the only reason you need.

As far as a runway.  Where you're going.  You don't need runways.  VTOL.  VTOL everything. 

Edited July 23, 2016 by klgraham1013

26 minutes ago, klgraham1013 said:

Sometimes your soul tells you to build a base behind some mountains.   That's the only reason you need.

 

If you build it, they will come!

As said above, 500 illuminators is going to kill your PC's framerate. But that many only use 10 zaps per second total. 15 RTGs is enough to power them all. Or 1 fuel cell array -- but then you need enough LFO to power that. Which could be done with a drill and ISRU.

7 hours ago, Effwon said:

1 I need a runway for all this...

so to get it there, I need to get hyperedit... Where do I get it?

2 After that, I need to make it cool and get life support mods and stuff...

3 I need to re learn how to make cars and rovers because my old ones no longer work in the new release...

4 I need to get A way to make enough power to light up 500 illuminator Mk2s.

And To top it all, a way to build this all in one peice...

... HOW do you intend to build a runway in the first place?

I have no idea if it's compatible with whatever version of KSP you have but look at Kerbal Konstructs and Kerbin-side, which uses it.  Far as I know @AlphaAsh is the guy who knows about all this stuff and amenable to questions whenever I'm asked him anything.

Edited July 24, 2016 by Pecan
